quote: Continued leadership in artificial intelligence is essential to ensuring both economic resilience and national security.
author: Executive Statement, 2020

quote: We must recruit and empower top talent while enabling them with modern tools like AI, machine learning, and real-time data analytics.
author: Technology Policy Brief, 2021

quote: This institution is where professionals are being trained through rigorous programs to become data scientists—ready to code, build, and deploy applications that will shape tomorrow’s challenges.
author: Senior Innovation Leader

quote: As operations increasingly depend on data-driven technologies, we must unify our data, software, and AI efforts to accelerate delivery of mission-ready capabilities.
author: Strategic Technology Directive, 2022
